lyric.verse: Sasayaki no tochuu ni Kaze no fuku aida ni Kimi no kata no mukoo ni Yureru taiyoo wa Ashita mo mata mitsukarukanatte Kimi ga kureta ai no uta Kudakeyuku kinoo ni Kasaneta te no hira ni Yogoreta kanashimi Kakureteta sugata wa Fukai fukai kokoro no mizuumi ni Uchi yoseru chiisana nami ni Kiete yukan da ne Hikari wo natteru Sore de ii yo ne Kirei dakara Obarekaketa senaka Toki no matsu sekai ga Tsunagara mada chiisana nami ni Itsu mo ai no uta wo dakishimeru yoo ni Kimi ga kureta ai no uta
